name: GeekShed Embed
author: Ryan Murphy

sections.description:
GeekShed Embed allows a user to easily embed a GeekShed IRC channel (chat room) onto their website. In additions to creating it via the options page, there are also two shortcodes that allow for use in page and/or post. Two other shortcodes are also included; one will display a list of users currently in the room, and the other will display a small userbadge with the number of chatters in the room.

Comments, questions, suggestions? Post them at
sections.installation:
1. Upload the GeekShed-Embed folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Visit the plugin’s options page, and set the options (and view usage instructions).
sections.changelog:
2.0.1

  • Height is not an on/off option.

2.0

  • Added options page
  • Shortcode no longer needed (but still included for backwards compatability), provided that a page is specified in the options.
  • In addition to old shortcode, a new one is included that will use the options from the database
  • Added user list, userbadge shortcodes
  • Fixed error in embed code

1.0

  • Initial public release.
  • Thanks to Craighton and eggy for testing

short_description: Easily add a GeekShed IRC channel (chat room) onto your site. Also includes shortcodes for other items provided by GeekShed
